import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import Card from '../components/Card'; import Badge from '../components/Badge'; const Courses = () => { const [activeLanguage, setActiveLanguage] = useState('french'); const courses = { french: [ { level: 'Beginner (A1)', title: 'French Basics', description: 'Introduction to French language and culture. Perfect for beginners with no prior knowledge.', duration: '3 months', schedule: '2 sessions per week', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0098.jpg', features: [ 'Basic vocabulary and grammar', 'Simple conversations', 'Cultural introduction', 'Interactive activities', ], }, { level: 'Intermediate (A2-B1)', title: 'French Communication', description: 'Develop your French speaking and comprehension skills for everyday situations.', duration: '4 months', schedule: '2 sessions per week', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0099.jpg', features: [ 'Advanced grammar structures', 'Fluency development', 'Cultural immersion', 'Group discussions', ], }, { level: 'Advanced (B2-C1)', title: 'French Mastery', description: 'Achieve fluency and cultural understanding for professional and academic purposes.', duration: '6 months', schedule: '3 sessions per week', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0100.jpg', features: [ 'Complex grammar and expressions', 'Business French', 'Academic writing', 'Cultural analysis', ], }, ], german: [ { level: 'Beginner (A1)', title: 'German Fundamentals', description: 'Start your German language journey with essential skills and cultural insights.', duration: '3 months', schedule: '2 sessions per week', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0101.jpg', features: [ 'Basic vocabulary and grammar', 'Simple conversations', 'Cultural introduction', 'Interactive activities', ], }, { level: 'Intermediate (A2-B1)', title: 'German Communication', description: 'Enhance your German language skills for effective communication.', duration: '4 months', schedule: '2 sessions per week', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0102.jpg', features: [ 'Advanced grammar structures', 'Fluency development', 'Cultural immersion', 'Group discussions', ], }, { level: 'Advanced (B2-C1)', title: 'German Excellence', description: 'Master German language and culture for professional and academic success.', duration: '6 months', schedule: '3 sessions per week', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0103.jpg', features: [ 'Complex grammar and expressions', 'Business German', 'Academic writing', 'Cultural analysis', ], }, ], }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Discover our comprehensive French and German language courses designed for all levels

{courses[activeLanguage].map((course, index) => (
{course.level}

{course.title}

{course.duration}
{course.schedule}
    {course.features.map((feature, featureIndex) => (

))}

{[ { name: 'Sarah M.', course: 'French Advanced', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0104.jpg', quote: 'The French course at Pearlson transformed my language skills and opened doors to new opportunities.', }, { name: 'John K.', course: 'German Intermediate', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0105.jpg', quote: 'Excellent teaching methods and supportive environment. I can now confidently speak German.', }, { name: 'Mary W.', course: 'French Beginner', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0106.jpg', quote: "Starting from scratch, I never thought I'd be able to hold conversations in French. Thank you, Pearlson!", }, ].map((testimonial, index) => (

{testimonial.name}

{testimonial.course}

"{testimonial.quote}"

 ))}
); }; export default Courses;
